name: Update 0.5
description: Added the ability to use code blocks in chats by using back-ticks (`). As well as this, the fresh new ... news log ... is here, and displays the **latest** and **greatest** updates Whiskers has to offer :shades:

name: Update 0.6
description: A new offline page and server reconnector has been added, now you will no longer need to reload the page every 10 minutes because the server timed out! :euphoric:

name: Update 0.7
description: New reply system, as well as the ability to edit and delete messages!! :happy: As well as this, we did some minor bug fixes, and started work on a couple brand new ... *things*

name: Update 0.8
description: ***BIGGEST UPDATE YET!!! :euphoric:*** Imgur and Tenor intergrations, profile pictures, settings overhaul, media uploads, sorted emojis trey, and, like always, minor bug fixes!

name: Update 0.9
description: Multiple bug fixes, better mobile expierence, user mentions, and user profiles! As well as this, we did some minor bug fixes, and started work on the last big stretch to make Whiskers fully complete!
